keyword: how many calories in bratwurst sausage
title: How Many Calories in Bratwurst Sausage?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in bratwurst sausage, including full nutrition breakdown per link, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in Bratwurst Sausage?
assumptions: Standard pork bratwurst, cooked (grilled), ~85 g per link, no added seasonings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, meat type, cooking method, and size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cooked bratwurst sausage provides ~290 kcal and ~12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use chicken bratwurst instead of pork
Add to a hot dog bun
Boiled in beer (adds minimal calories but flavor)

faqs.q: How many calories in one bratwurst sausage?
faqs.a: Approximately 290 kcal for a standard 85 g cooked pork bratwurst.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in bratwurst?

faqs.a: Yes, ~25 g total fat per sausage, with 9 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in bratwurst?
faqs.a: Grilling or boiling keeps calories similar; frying adds ~50-100 kcal from oil.

faqs.q: What about sodium in bratwurst sausage?
faqs.a: Around 800 mg per sausage, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.
